name: BugBots (itch)
description:
This game is now available!

This game is a top-down 2d shooter where you play as a bugbot searching for energy crystals, watching out for enemies and obstacles. The demo only has two levels, full game has all 10 levels.

Press [ 1 ] for Control A or [ 2 ] for Control B.

Control A:
Aim with mouse to go in the direction you want to go.
Forward is  [ ↑ ] or [ W ].
Strafe right/left of bugbot is [→]  /  [←] or [ A ] / [ D ].
Backward is [ ↓ ] or [ S ]

Control B:
Move mouse to aim.
Up is  [ ↑ ] or [W].
Right/left is [→]  /  [←] or [ A ] / [ D ] .
Down is [ ↓ ] or [ S ] .

Left mouse Button is to Fire.
[ ESC ] to Pause.
